ingredients: 1.5 Lbs Bernards Cajun Acadian Clover Honey
1 oz Saaz leaf hops- in Boil 60 minutes
1/2 oz Hallertauer Pellet Hops-in Boil 60 minutes
1/2 oz Hallertauer Pellet hops steeped in a French Press for 30 minutes added in the last 10 minutes of Boil
1 tsp yeast fuel in last 10 minutes
name: Sticky Wig Weekend Light Ale
